vote.title: Authorize an increase to the construction services contract with Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, LLC for the construction of the Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation located at 3809 Grand Avenue in Fair Park - Not to exceed $415,140.00, from $4,583,042.90 to $4,998,182.90 - Financing: Fair Park Capital Reserve Fund
